name: Customize Your Wool Billfold Wallet with a Zipper Pocket NEW
description:
Customize any Men's Wool Billfold wallet in my shop with an additional pocket for change! This listing is for the pocket only, and a wallet must be purchased along with this add on.

Purchase this listing along with your choice of any mens wallet from my shop to have a handy 3" change pocket added right on the back of your wallet.

**This is not a stand alone listing and must be purchase with a wallet.**

Your choice of grey, black or brown zipper to match any of my fabrics.

All wallets are made-to-order and will be completed in one week of purchase. A shipping notification will be sent when your order is ready to mail.

name: Minimalist Slimline Wallet Light Grey Wool 5 Pocket Billfold
description:
The Oh So Retro billfold wallet is a simple yet stylish way to carry your cash and cards featuring a large billfold pocket and 4 staggered card pockets that will hold up to three cards each.

Measures approx 8" x 3.25" when open, 4" x 3.25" when closed. It's the perfect size to tuck into your back pocket.

Made from eco-friendly light grey wool with a grey twill interior. It has been interfaced for stability with just the right amount of stiffness to it.

Now you can choose your interior colour from the following options:

Black
Grey
Red
Orange
Yellow
Turquoise Blue
Grey Blue
Burgundy

All wallets are made-to-order and will be completed in one week of purchase. A shipping notification will be sent when your order is ready to mail.
